name: Anubis Awoken
description:
You are Anubis, the recently slumbering god of death. Having been rudely awoken from your slumber, you shall teach the foolish priests a lesson by biting their faces off and putting them to sleep so you may absorb their life force.

Submission for the Score-space jam 20.

Allerises - Game Design/Programming

Alexythmya - Game Design/Art

Music assets were used with creative commons, they are linked below:

https://freesound.org/people/Iceofdoom/sounds/385819/

https://freesound.org/people/Gavin6049/sounds/621145/
